replies.body:
Seguendo questo post della Riot sui bug splat ho risolto:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-windows

ho risolto grazie a questo genione dellla NA
vi lascio sooto il suo post:


"Hello friend!

I definitely understand something like this could be extremely irritating, so I am going to try my best to help you with the issue you are having!

The DirectX error you are receiving can be caused by a few things, though usually it has to do with your video card not running properly or DirectX being out of date, etc. I am going to give you a few solutions that may help with the issue you are having!

Firstly, you should make sure your DirectX is up-to-date the update link can be found here. (it all depends on the specific OS you are running), this can often be the root cause of the issue you are receiving.

The next thing you should do is make sure your version of Windows is completely updated as well as making sure all of your graphic's drivers are updated (which I know you have already done). If you have already made sure they are up-to-date, I would recommend a reset on your Graphic's card (to do this varies by the graphic's card you are using)

So here are the two most common:

NVIDIA Control Panel
Right-click on your desktop and select NVIDIA Control Panel.
Select Manage 3D Settings.
Click on Restore Defaults.

Catalyst Control Center (AMD)
Right-click on your desktop and select Catalyst Control Center (also called VISION center).
Select Preferences.
Click on Restore Factory Defaults."
